ValidationRule.description: Mandatory Root Cause to close Salesforce Support Unsuccessfully
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (RecordType.DeveloperName = "SALESFORCE_SUPPORT" ) && (ISPICKVAL( Type,"Feature Request") || ISPICKVAL( Type,"Soft Feature Request") ) && (ISPICKVAL( Closed_Reason__c,"Not Successful") ) && ISBLANK( Root_Cause__c)
